QuestData.Title: Pursuit of Justice
QuestData.Description:
Draka stands ready to unleash the power of the necropolis upon Gharmal. We need only buy her time to focus its weaponry.
What we do now, we do for all of us. Bastion and Maldraxxus have both lost much to these fiends.
Gharmal will not be defeated easily... but united, our forces will finally bring them to justice!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The Margrave must be stopped once and for all.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Xandria by Gharmal's corpse.
